name: fullscreenspora
description: don’t waste page space of diaspora
additional_info:
Hide right navigation bar, profileimage and your name (you should know, who you are)

Makes the left navigation bar horizontal.

Aspects and tags only appear if you mouseover them.

/stream, /aspects or /followed_tags will take 100% of your window width.

changelog:

fixed youtube previews

working with all pods, due to regular expressions

less usage of ‘!important’ hack

overlapping dropdown menus for aspects and tags

compatible with new diaspora design

--

Comment box in single post view also 100% (removed)

maximum width for images, else they are way to big.

comment boxes also 100%
